A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Force Awakens was my least favorite Star Wars movie before I saw The last Jedi. Yes I like episodes 1\,2 & 3 more than the last episodes 7 & 8. With The Last Jedi we finally see Disney doing what everyone thought they would do\, milking Star Wars for all it was worth\, and was that milking scene in the movie for us fans in case we had doubts? 

The acting was bad even by Star Wars standards. The movie was mainly shown in dark scenes (hiding the bad CGI?) The story was almost totally redundant. The villain was totally wasted. Luke was terrible. Rey was unwatchable and the whole thing felt so small. Like watching 2 average episodes of a Syfy show on Netflix one after the other.

Besides when the Calamari Cruiser crashed into Snoke's Ship nothing else was WOW worthy.

I hate to say this but I want Lucas Back. Lift your game Disney. Please.
